p: “There is wide statistical support for a causal link between ZIKV and severe manifestations such as microcephaly [Rubin, Greene and Baden, 2016; de Araújo et al., 2016a; de Araújo et al., 2016b; Honein et al., 2017; Brasil et al., 2016; de Oliveira et al., 2017], and the proposed link in 2015 led to the declaration of the South American epidemic…”
